name: ABC Knight Run
description:
Play as the ABC Knight, the curious noble who runs and jumps across a colorful world to collect scattered ABC's, while learning about the world of words and alphabets.

• Epic adventure through A-to-Z.
• Learn the alphabet by using pictures.
• Dangerous enemies await.
• Beautiful and colorful worlds to explore
• Collect all the alphabets and words
• Collect all the stars, and hearts to get the max score
• Let your kids compete with there friends
• Challenging yet simple gameplay for kids

Let your kids learn their ABC's in a fun new way that they will remember!
